Name: IncomingLinkAddedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when an incoming link is added to the port.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> the link was added to.

Name: IncomingLinkRemovedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when an incoming link is removed from the port.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> the link was removed from.

Name: OutgoingLinkAddedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when an outgoing link is added to the port.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> the link was added to.

Name: OutgoingLinkRemovedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when an outgoing link is removed from the port.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> the link was removed from.

Name: PortAddedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a port is added to a node or group.

Name: PortAlignmentChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the visual alignment of the port changes (e.g., from Left to Top).

Name: PortClickedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when an <c>@onclick</c> event occurs on a port.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> that triggered the event.

Name: PortDoubleClickedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when an <c>@ondblclick</c> event occurs on a port.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> that triggered the event.

Name: PortJustificationChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the justification (e.g., start, center, end) of a port changes.

Name: PortParentChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a port is moved from one container (node or group) to another.

Parameters.Name: OldParent
Parameters.Documentation: The previous container that held the port.

Parameters.Name: NewParent
Parameters.Documentation: The new container that now holds the port.

Name: PortPointerDownEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer (e.g., mouse or touch) is pressed down on a port.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> that triggered the event.

Name: PortPointerEnterEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer enters the bounds of a port.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> that triggered the event.

Name: PortPointerLeaveEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer leaves the bounds of a port.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> that triggered the event.

Name: PortPointerMoveEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer moves over a port.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> that triggered the event.

Name: PortPointerUpEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer is released from a port.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> that triggered the event.

Name: PortPositionChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a port's position changes relative to its parent.

Name: PortRedrawEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a redraw is manually requested for a port.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> that requested the redraw.

Name: PortRemovedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a port is removed from a node or group.

Name: PortSelectionChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a port is selected.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> whose selection status changed.

Name: PortSizeChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the size (width or height) of a port changes.

Name: PortVisibilityChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the visibility state of a port changes.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> whose visibility state changed.

Name: PortWheelEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the mouse wheel is scrolled while over a port.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazored.Diagrams.Ports.IPort" /> that triggered the event.
